content: So, the recent update at BC GAME.They will force you to take the deposit bonus, there is no option to cancel it. Once your deposit is bigger than 30$ it will instantly lock you with a 40x wager on slots or 120x on house games or 800x on live dealer.Because I didn't want the deposit bonus I chose to make 2 x under 30$ deposits and play without rules.I made 57.5$ and tried to withdraw.Keep in mind they added a new system that says you must wager your deposit 1x - okay, understandable anti-money laundering right?But I had wagered my deposit around 10x at the point of withdraw request and the system still says I can't withdraw.So about after 30 minutes waiting for a support answer they tell me to wait 2 hours for the wager to be updated. Can't get more predatory than this, looool?!I wait about 30 more minutes.So here's where I lose my patience and just play a bit, after losing a bit was down to 40$. Decided to do an all in buy for 40$.Thank fuck I have everything on recording, they would try to deny everything otherwise. What they would usually do on a case like this is to say the buy was 0x and tell you to piss off. You can clearly see that after I bought the bonus I had an instant error and the free spins never played out. Try proving that without a recording.VID1 - Start of the bonus buy: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yeCbuP3ArWdBeKFsfmXeZZudn5rcBPid/VID2 - Support conversation, transactions and refresh of the game: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1iNUQo2ntZb1qG8g8F76foKwTdKXhJD0h/You be the judge of this.
